summary: They say a picture is worth a thousand words. See the pictures and decide. NoHiDef or HiDef.
descriptionHtml:
As we all should know Skyrim is 32bit with a 3gb total capacity. ANYTHING added to the game load will decrease the 3gb from the game.
Hi Def graphics take a lot of game load. Yet there are a lot of Hi Def mods available that are a
total waste of space. If you start with a poor quality texture, it does not matter how many DPI
you add, the visual graphic will not improve.
Look at the pictures I've uploaded. All pictures on the left with HD texture mods installed.
And the picture on right is NON HD textures. You decide which visually looks better.
These pictures are in game before and after snapshots. Using a Full HD monitor.
If you like my textures then download my file.
Simple Install:
1: Unzip file
2: Drop texture folder on your "Data" folder inside your Skyrim directory.
That's it. Hope you enjoy these textures.
PS: The last picture is the inside of breezehome with a small modification I thought someone
might want to make on their own in Creation Kit.
author: Twisted Slave Master
